overview: The story of the comedy is about a group of blind people who live in a place that is like hell and is not surrounded by any kind of care or appreciation for their difficult situation comes to them Arafa Shawaf (Mohammed Sobhi) blind who was in prison and came out to come and lead them and become their leader and tries to uncover the head of the body who does not He cares about them and does not give them their money.
title: A Point of View
